name: Firbolg
description: Firbolgs are forest dwellers with a deep connection to nature. They are gentle giants, standing taller than most humanoids, with broad features and thick fur. Firbolgs live in harmony with the natural world, often acting as its protectors. They prefer to keep to themselves, avoiding conflicts unless nature itself is threatened.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common, Elvish, and Giant.
special: Hidden Step: As a bonus action, you can magically turn invisible until the start of your next turn or until you attack, make a damage roll, or force someone to make a saving throw. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining all uses after a long rest.
